overview: For over 15 years the mega motorsport of motorcycle hillclimbing and Widowmaker has been missing from the hills of Utah. The extreme sport of challenging “1,000 feet of hell” returns as Team Big Rock captures the 1st rider ever to conquer this massive challenge. From the producers of the #1 selling extreme off-road DVD series in the world comes Widowmaker 2003.
tagline: One Rider, One Motorcycle, One Hill
title: Widowmaker 2003
